Description:
Job Overview:We are seeking a Technical Sales Specialist to join our sales team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for providing technical support to the sales team and customers, while also assisting with sales activities.Responsibilities:Provide technical support to the sales team and customers, including product information, technical specifications, and application guidance.
Prepare and deliver technical presentations to customers.
Assist with preparing quotes, bids, and proposals for customers.
Collaborate with the sales team to identify new sales opportunities.
Assist with developing and maintaining relationships with customers and prospects.
Conduct market research and provide insights to the sales team.
Work with the engineering team to develop customized solutions for customers.
Meet or exceed sales targets.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Electrical engineering, business or Marketing.
Minimum of 2 years of experience in technical sales.
Knowledge of technical products and services.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Excellent presentation and negotiation skills.
Willingness to travel as required.
